version_description: Improvements in access and compatibility

New in this version:
• Detailed consultation on investment funds, securities accounts, loans and mortgages.
• ATM locator (our own and those of other banks).
• Use Touch ID to authenticate.

New in this version:
- Transfers: View and repeat transfers.
- Cards: activation or cancellation, Credit Express, paying money into your account, checking your card limits and repayment method.
- Direct Debits: View your Direct Debits and request a refund.
- View your pension plans.
- Improved ATM locator.
- Charts of securities, investment funds and loans.
- Contact your personal manager.
- View your IBAN details.

New in this version:
· Improvements in access and compatibility.
· Mutual funds and securities charts are available again.
· Security: Restricted usage in jailbroken devices.

New in this version:
· Correspondence: Show documents in PDF.
· Accounts: Show retentions and authorizations.
· Brokerage accounts: Show brokerage orders.
· Direct debits: Update direct debit orders.

New in this version:
· Standing orders: Create, edit or cancel standing orders.
· Cards: Request a card duplicate.
· Correspondence: Activate online correspondence.
· Brokerage accounts: Show brokerage operations.

New in this version:
· Contact us: Check and update your address and contact details.
· Mailbox: More details in message.
· ATMs and branches: Improvements to geolocation.

New in this version:
· The Touch ID issue, occuring on some devices, has been resolved.

New in this version:
· Global position: New design and navigation.
· Accounts and cards: New design and navigation.

New in this version:
·Loans and mortgages: new design and navigation.
·Correspondence: new investment reports section.

·Accounts: See transactions performed during weekends, no need to wait until Monday.
·Mutual funds: New design and navigation.

New Flexipago service: Choose when and how to pay for your transfers and card movements.
Access without reference: You can now access the Mi Banco DB app by entering only your password.
Easier access to transfers: Access your transfers and payments more quickly and easily directly from your accounts.
Subscription of funds: Access your fund subscriptions easily with a direct link to our Online Banking.
New Direct Debit view: Review the details of your Direct Debit payments in a clearer format and with a simple return procedure.

New Flexipago service: Choose when and how to pay for your transfers and card movements.
Access without reference: You can now access the Mi Banco DB app by entering only your password.
Easier access to transfers: Access your transfers and payments more quickly and easily directly from your accounts.
Subscription of funds: Access your fund subscriptions easily with a direct link to our Online Banking.
New Direct Debit view: Review the details of your Direct Debit payments in a clearer format and with a simple return procedure.

New in this version:
· Configuration enhancements and performance improvements

New in this version:
- Securities view in a clearer format. Access the portfolio, orders and transactions tab to view all the details of your positions.
- Configuration enhancements and process improvements

New in this version:
- Securities view in a clearer format. Access the portfolio, orders and transactions tab to view all the details of your positions.
- Configuration enhancements and process improvements

New in this version:
- Easier access to several sections of the application.
- New designs for all the Contact and Settings subsections.
- Configuration enhancements and process improvements

New in this version:
- Easier access to several sections of the application.
- New designs for all the Contact and Settings subsections.
- Configuration enhancements and process improvements

New in this version:
- Easier access to several sections of the application.
- New designs for all the Contact and Settings subsections.
- Configuration enhancements and process improvements

Nous nous améliorons sans cesse pour vous ...
- Nouveau nom et nouvelle icône pour l'App. Pas de panique, il vous suffit de mettre l'application à jour pour profiter de toutes ses nouveautés !
- Un design amélioré dans la position globale.
- Des accès rapides grâce au nouveau menu inférieur.
- Des mouvements de compte plus détaillés.

We present you our news:
- New app name and icon. Don’t panic! You will benefit from all of its new features by just updating the app.
- Enhanced design of your overall balance.
- Quick access from the new bottom menu.
- More details about transactions on your account.

Te presentamos nuestras novedades:
- Cambiamos de nombre e icono, cuando actualices nos encontrarás en tu pantalla como DB App.
- Nueva posición global más fácil e intuitiva.
- Accesos rápidos a través del nuevo menú inferior.
- Correcciones:
> acceso con configuración de tamaño de fuente alta
> revisión/actualización DNI

Nuevo en esta versión:
- Mejoras técnicas y correcciones
